data.title: Leon Lai marries for second time
data.meta_description: Hong Kong pop star Leon Lai (pic) is reported to have married Wing Chan.
data.text:
Nation

Compiled by YIMIE YONG, MARTIN CARVALHO and R. ARAVINTHAN

Hong Kong pop star Leon Lai (pic) is reported to have married Wing Chan.
